[59]《伪经》中的《西比路神谕》（Sibylline Oracles）利用了《希腊西比路神谕》的文体、格调写成宣扬犹太教信仰和盼望弥赛亚来 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin Sibillinus, from Sibylla  (see sibyl)

means.word_mean: 1. resembling or characteristic of a prophet or prophecy;

sentences.sentence: "a kind of sibylline book with ready and infallible answers to questions"

means.word_mean: 2. having a secret or hidden meaning;

sentences.sentence: "thoroughly sibylline in most of his pronouncements"- John Gunther

auth_sentence.content: His Sibylline whisper would change to a louder note.
auth_sentence.res_content: His Sibylline whisper would change to a louder note.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His Sibylline whisper would change to a louder note.

auth_sentence.content: For all her sibylline grandeur, Georgina remained an aunt.
auth_sentence.res_content: For all her sibylline grandeur, Georgina remained an aunt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For all her sibylline grandeur, Georgina remained an aunt.

sentences.en: a kind of sibylline book with ready and infallible answers to questions
sentences.cn: 有对各种问题有现成正确解答的预言书
